bwwExcerpt: For those of us of a certain age, to watch director Ivo van Hove's production - the storytelling takes place in part on a slew of screens throughout the theater - is to mutter to ourselves about how on earth wily old Paddy C (he died in 1981) knew so well what was coming. Everything the movie predicted, like, happened.
